solution_line_template: The drinks cost a total of ${cost_per_drink} per drink * {num_drinks} drinks = ${<<{cost_per_drink}*{num_drinks}={total_drink_cost}>>}{total_drink_cost}.
So the sandwiches cost a total of ${total_spending} total spending - ${total_drink_cost} spending on drinks = ${<<{total_spending}-{total_drink_cost}={total_sandwich_cost}>>}{total_sandwich_cost}.
Therefore, each sandwich costs ${total_sandwich_cost} for sandwiches / {num_sandwiches} sandwiches = ${<<{total_sandwich_cost}/{num_sandwiches}={cost_per_sandwich}>>}{cost_per_sandwich}.
